configuration.title: Upload Files
configuration.properties.apiEndpoint: The url for receiving http request
configuration.properties.httpHeaders: Add custom http headers(useful for authorization)
configuration.properties.fileField: File field name specified in multipart/form-data object(default `file`)
configuration.properties.options.compres: Compress multiple files with zip or tar before uploading
configuration.properties.userDefinedData: User defined data in multipart/form-data object
